where is boris savov from?
answer: With Master's degree from Technical University of Sofia, Boris Savov has 1 yr 2 mos of experience as a Senior Electrical Engineer at StarFish Medical in Victoria, British Columbia, Canada, 3 yrs 11 mos of experience as a Senior Staff Engineer at Stryker / Novadaq in British Columbia, Canada, 9 yrs 2 mos of experience as a Senior Design Engineer at NOVADAQ in British Columbia, Canada, 9 mos of experience as a Test Engineer at Creation Technologies in British Columbia, Canada, 5 yrs 10 mos of experience as a Electrical Design Engineer at Xillix Technologies in Richmond, British Columbia, Canada, 2 yrs 7 mos of experience as a Electrical Design Engineer at International En-R-Tech in Delta, British Columbia, Canada and is proficient in Electrical Engineering, Architectural Schematics and PCB Design, Research and Development (R&D), Electrical Design, Electronic Engineering, Electrical Testing, Image Sensors.
